trans-unit.source: Learn about compute enviornments that you can use in Azure Data Factory pipelines to transform/process data.
trans-unit.target: Learn about compute enviornments that you can use in Azure Data Factory pipelines to transform/process data.

trans-unit.source: This article explains different compute environments that you can use to process or transform data.
trans-unit.target: This article explains different compute environments that you can use to process or transform data.

trans-unit.source: It also provides details about different configurations (on-demand vs. bring your own) supported by Data Factory when configuring linked services linking these compute environments to an Azure data factory.
trans-unit.target: It also provides details about different configurations (on-demand vs. bring your own) supported by Data Factory when configuring linked services linking these compute environments to an Azure data factory.

trans-unit.source: In this type of configuration, the computing environment is fully managed by the Azure Data Factory service.
trans-unit.target: In this type of configuration, the computing environment is fully managed by the Azure Data Factory service.

trans-unit.source: It is automatically created by the Data Factory service before a job is submitted to process data and removed when the job is completed.
trans-unit.target: It is automatically created by the Data Factory service before a job is submitted to process data and removed when the job is completed.

trans-unit.source: You can create a linked service for the on-demand compute environment, configure it, and control granular settings for job execution, cluster management, and bootstrapping actions.
trans-unit.target: You can create a linked service for the on-demand compute environment, configure it, and control granular settings for job execution, cluster management, and bootstrapping actions.

trans-unit.source: The on-demand configuration is currently supported only for Azure HDInsight clusters.
trans-unit.target: The on-demand configuration is currently supported only for Azure HDInsight clusters.

trans-unit.source: The on-demand HDInsight cluster is automatically created by the Azure Data Factory service to process data.
trans-unit.target: The on-demand HDInsight cluster is automatically created by the Azure Data Factory service to process data.

trans-unit.source: The cluster is created in the region that is same as that of the storage account (linkedServiceName property in the JSON) associated with the cluster.
trans-unit.target: The cluster is created in the region that is same as that of the storage account (linkedServiceName property in the JSON) associated with the cluster.

trans-unit.source: Note the following important points about on-demand HDInsight linked service:
trans-unit.target: Note the following important points about on-demand HDInsight linked service:

trans-unit.source: You will not see the on-demand HDInsight cluster created in your Azure subscription; the Azure Data Factory service manages the on-demand HDInsight cluster on your behalf.
trans-unit.target: You will not see the on-demand HDInsight cluster created in your Azure subscription; the Azure Data Factory service manages the on-demand HDInsight cluster on your behalf.

trans-unit.source: The logs for jobs that are run on an on-demand HDInsight cluster are copied to the storage account associated with the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: The logs for jobs that are run on an on-demand HDInsight cluster are copied to the storage account associated with the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: You can access these logs from the Azure Portal in the Activity Run Details blade.
trans-unit.target: You can access these logs from the Azure Portal in the Activity Run Details blade.

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>Monitor and Manage Pipelines</linkText><title></title></link> article for details.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>Monitor and Manage Pipelines</linkText><title></title></link> article for details.

trans-unit.source: You will be charged only for the time when the HDInsight cluster is up and running jobs.
trans-unit.target: You will be charged only for the time when the HDInsight cluster is up and running jobs.

trans-unit.source: It typically takes more than 15 minutes to provision an Azure HDInsight cluster on demand.
trans-unit.target: It typically takes more than 15 minutes to provision an Azure HDInsight cluster on demand.

trans-unit.source: The type property should be set to HDInsightOnDemand.
trans-unit.target: The type property should be set to HDInsightOnDemand.

trans-unit.source: The size of the on-demand cluster.
trans-unit.target: The size of the on-demand cluster.

trans-unit.source: Specify how many nodes you want to be in this on-demand cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specify how many nodes you want to be in this on-demand cluster.

trans-unit.source: The blob container that holds data used by pig/hive/package jobs and where the cluster logs will be stored.
trans-unit.target: The blob container that holds data used by pig/hive/package jobs and where the cluster logs will be stored.

trans-unit.source: <html></html>The allowed idle time for the on-demand HDInsight cluster.Specifies how long the on-demand HDInsight cluster will stay alive after completion of an activity run if there are no other active jobs in the cluster.<html></html><html></html>For example, if an activity run takes 6 minutes and timetolive is set to 5 minutes, the cluster stays alive for 5 minutes after the 6 minutes of processing the activity run.If another activity run is executed with the 6 minutes window, it is processed by the same cluster.<html></html><html></html>Creating an on-demand HDInsight cluster is an expensive operation (could take a while), so use this setting as needed to improve performance of a data factory by reusing an on-demand HDInsight cluster.<html></html><html></html>If you set timetolive value to 0, the cluster is deleted as soon as the activity run in processed.On the other hand, if you set a high value, the cluster may stay idle unnecessarily resulting in high costs.Therefore, it is important that you set the appropriate value based on your needs.<html></html><html></html>Multiple pipelines can share the same instance of the on-demand HDInsight cluster if the timetolive property value is appropriately set<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>The allowed idle time for the on-demand HDInsight cluster.Specifies how long the on-demand HDInsight cluster will stay alive after completion of an activity run if there are no other active jobs in the cluster.<html></html><html></html>For example, if an activity run takes 6 minutes and timetolive is set to 5 minutes, the cluster stays alive for 5 minutes after the 6 minutes of processing the activity run.If another activity run is executed with the 6 minutes window, it is processed by the same cluster.<html></html><html></html>Creating an on-demand HDInsight cluster is an expensive operation (could take a while), so use this setting as needed to improve performance of a data factory by reusing an on-demand HDInsight cluster.<html></html><html></html>If you set timetolive value to 0, the cluster is deleted as soon as the activity run in processed.On the other hand, if you set a high value, the cluster may stay idle unnecessarily resulting in high costs.Therefore, it is important that you set the appropriate value based on your needs.<html></html><html></html>Multiple pipelines can share the same instance of the on-demand HDInsight cluster if the timetolive property value is appropriately set<html></html>

trans-unit.source: The blob store to be used by the on-demand cluster for storing and processing data.
trans-unit.target: The blob store to be used by the on-demand cluster for storing and processing data.

trans-unit.source: Specifies additional storage accounts for the HDInsight linked service so that the Data Factory service can register them on your behalf.
trans-unit.target: Specifies additional storage accounts for the HDInsight linked service so that the Data Factory service can register them on your behalf.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify the following properties for the granular configuration of the on-demand HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: You can also specify the following properties for the granular configuration of the on-demand HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the core configuration parameters (as in core-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster to be created.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the core configuration parameters (as in core-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster to be created.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the HBase configuration parameters (hbase-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the HBase configuration parameters (hbase-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the HDFS configuration parameters (hdfs-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the HDFS configuration parameters (hdfs-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the hive configuration parameters (hive-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the hive configuration parameters (hive-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the MapReduce configuration parameters (mapred-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the MapReduce configuration parameters (mapred-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Oozie configuration parameters (oozie-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Oozie configuration parameters (oozie-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Storm configuration parameters (storm-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Storm configuration parameters (storm-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Yarn configuration parameters (yarn-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Yarn configuration parameters (yarn-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Example – On-demand HDInsight cluster configuration with advanced properties
trans-unit.target: Example – On-demand HDInsight cluster configuration with advanced properties

trans-unit.source: In this type of configuration, users can register an already existing computing environment as a linked service in Data Factory.
trans-unit.target: In this type of configuration, users can register an already existing computing environment as a linked service in Data Factory.

trans-unit.source: The computing environment is managed by the user and the Data Factory service uses it to execute the activities.
trans-unit.target: The computing environment is managed by the user and the Data Factory service uses it to execute the activities.

trans-unit.source: This type of configuration is supported for the following compute environments:
trans-unit.target: This type of configuration is supported for the following compute environments:

trans-unit.source: You can create an Azure HDInsight linked service to register your own HDInsight cluster with Data Factory.
trans-unit.target: You can create an Azure HDInsight linked service to register your own HDInsight cluster with Data Factory.

trans-unit.source: The type property should be set to HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: The type property should be set to HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: The URI of the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: The URI of the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of the user to be used to connect to an existing HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specify the name of the user to be used to connect to an existing HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Specify password for the user account.
trans-unit.target: Specify password for the user account.

trans-unit.source: Specify the location of the HDInsight cluster (for example: WestUS).
trans-unit.target: Specify the location of the HDInsight cluster (for example: WestUS).

trans-unit.source: Name of the linked service for the blob storage used by this HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Name of the linked service for the blob storage used by this HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: You can create an Azure Batch linked service to register a Batch pool of virtual machines (VMs) to a data factory.
trans-unit.target: You can create an Azure Batch linked service to register a Batch pool of virtual machines (VMs) to a data factory.

trans-unit.source: You can run .NET custom activities using either Azure Batch or Azure HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: You can run .NET custom activities using either Azure Batch or Azure HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: See following topics if you are new to Azure Batch service:
trans-unit.target: See following topics if you are new to Azure Batch service:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Azure Batch Technical Overview</linkText><title></title></link> for an overview of the Azure Batch service.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Azure Batch Technical Overview</linkText><title></title></link> for an overview of the Azure Batch service.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>New-AzureBatchAccount</linkText><title></title></link> cmdlet to create an Azure Batch account (or) <link><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><title></title></link> to create the Azure Batch account using Azure Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>New-AzureBatchAccount</linkText><title></title></link> cmdlet to create an Azure Batch account (or) <link><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><title></title></link> to create the Azure Batch account using Azure Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>Using PowerShell to manage Azure Batch Account</linkText><title></title></link> topic for detailed instructions on using the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>Using PowerShell to manage Azure Batch Account</linkText><title></title></link> topic for detailed instructions on using the cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>New-AzureBatchPool</linkText><title></title></link> cmdlet to create an Azure Batch pool.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>New-AzureBatchPool</linkText><title></title></link> cmdlet to create an Azure Batch pool.

trans-unit.source: Append "." to the name of your batch account for the accountName property. Example:
trans-unit.target: Append "." to the name of your batch account for the accountName property. Example:

trans-unit.source: Another option is to provide the batchUri endpoint as shown below.
trans-unit.target: Another option is to provide the batchUri endpoint as shown below.

trans-unit.source: The type property should be set to AzureBatch.
trans-unit.target: The type property should be set to AzureBatch.

trans-unit.source: Name of the Azure Batch account.
trans-unit.target: Name of the Azure Batch account.

trans-unit.source: Access key for the Azure Batch account.
trans-unit.target: Access key for the Azure Batch account.

trans-unit.source: Name of the pool of virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: Name of the pool of virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: Name of the Azure Storage linked service associated with this Azure Batch linked service.
trans-unit.target: Name of the Azure Storage linked service associated with this Azure Batch linked service.

trans-unit.source: This linked service is used for staging files required to run the activity and storing the activity execution logs.
trans-unit.target: This linked service is used for staging files required to run the activity and storing the activity execution logs.

trans-unit.source: You create an Azure Machine Learning linked service to register a Machine Learning batch scoring endpoint to a data factory.
trans-unit.target: You create an Azure Machine Learning linked service to register a Machine Learning batch scoring endpoint to a data factory.

trans-unit.source: The type property should be set to: AzureML.
trans-unit.target: The type property should be set to: AzureML.

trans-unit.source: You create an Azure SQL linked service and use it with the <link><linkText>Stored Procedure Activity</linkText><title></title></link> to invoke a stored procedure from a Data Factory pipeline.
trans-unit.target: You create an Azure SQL linked service and use it with the <link><linkText>Stored Procedure Activity</linkText><title></title></link> to invoke a stored procedure from a Data Factory pipeline.

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>Azure SQL Connector</linkText><title></title></link> article for details about this linked service.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>Azure SQL Connector</linkText><title></title></link> article for details about this linked service.
